channel.title: tips on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in tips on Fresh Swift

item.title: 10 Quick Swift Tips
item.description: This is an enjoyable list of 10 Swift tips from Paul Hudson. As Paul says, Swift is a huge language with lots of interesting syntax and features. Paul looks at 10 such features, providing code examples for all.

item.title: Swift tips and tricks
item.description: This Github page is a list of Swift tips and tricks, compiled by Svyat Zubyak. Something to bookmark and scan through while you wait for projects to build.
